node.statement: PART 1 - INVERSE VERIFICATION (citing Cycle_Inverse): By Cycle_Inverse, reversing (1 2 4 5) gives (5 4 2 1), standard form g_2^{-1} = (1 5 4 2). By Cycle_Inverse, reversing (5 6 2 3) gives (3 2 6 5), standard form g_3^{-1} = (5 3 2 6). Verification: g_2 maps 1→2, g_2^{-1} maps 2→1. g_3 maps 5→6, g_3^{-1} maps 6→5. Correct.
